name: canshare-non-ajcc-staging-system
title: NZ cancer non-AJCC staging system
description: Non-AJCC staging systems that may be used to classify the stage of a cancer diagnosis or an 'Other' value.

filter.value: (^ 253311000210106 |New Zealand cancer staging system reference set| OR 74964007 |Other (qualifier value)|) MINUS (443830009 |AJCC cancer staging manual, 7th edition| OR 897275008 |AJCC 8th edition tumour staging system| OR 1269566009 |AJCC 9th edition tumour staging system|)

German Hodgkin study group Hodgkin treatment stratification

International Federation of Gynecology and Obstetrics 2015 corpus uteri leiomyosarcoma and/or endometrial stromal sarcoma staging system
International Federation of Gynecology and Obstetrics 2018 cervix uteri staging system

International Federation of Gynecology and Obstetrics 2021 vulva staging system
International Federation of Gynecology and Obstetrics 2023 corpus uteri carcinoma and/or carcinosarcoma staging system
